text: @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer Nancy P so why didn't YOU and CHUCK in asking for the CoronaVirus funds $8.3 Billion include help for Sick leave or Family leave of those Infected with the Virus, why is $2.3 Billion going to Foreign Countries Unknown Nancy wants in the $8.3 Billion. Start thinking of US Citizens
